ValidationRule.description: If currency is USD or CAD, only US support packages can be used.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode, "CAD"), ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode, "USD")), OR(Product2.Id = '01t0P000005EhYm', Product2.Id = "01t0P000005EhYh", Product2.Id = "01t0P000005EhYX") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please use US support packages (Basic, Plus, and Enterprise).
